elements.name: question1
elements.title: What requirements must be met in order to develop a unique, non-interchangeable story that engages and intrinsically motivates the audience?

choices.text: The history of a company is presented with a timeline.
choices.value: The history of a company is presented with a timeline.

choices: The story reflects the company's DNA.
The story makes the company and its achievements tangible and tangible.
The story creates an attention-grabbing, distinctive positioning against the competition.
The story should be as factual as possible, without much emotion.
The story grabs the listener, who ideally makes a positive purchase decision.
The story contains as many details as possible in order to convey as much information as possible.
correctAnswer: The story reflects the company's DNA.
The story makes the company and its achievements tangible and tangible.
The story creates an attention-grabbing, distinctive positioning against the competition.
The story grabs the listener, who ideally makes a positive purchase decision.
